pages.title: Dwarf Base
pages.text: Dwarf bases spawn underground in the $(l:e_dimension_insanity_dimension)Insanity/el and $(l:e_dimension_depth_dimension)Depth/el dimensions. They have a $(l:e_block_dwarf_base_marker)Dwarf Base Marker/el at their center which will occasionally spawn new $(l:e_entity_dwarf)Dwarves/el.
